name: Something, something, television
description:
Being a camera operator during big events is not an easy job.  Wanna check how is it like?

Keep your camera moving using WSAD to record interesting footage. Your sixth sense will point you what you can't show on TV - try to avoid this or your boss won't pay you too much.

Have an extra player with you? Great! Push START button on a controller during the gameplay to enter an asymetric multiplayer mode! In this mode player with a controller try to show bad behavior on TV (use A to do it) while his oponent try to record an interesting material and shoot him with with a sniper rifle (use mouse to aim and left button to shoot). The game ends when the salary equals 0 or player 2 had been shot 10 times.

Made for Global Game Jam 2018 (theme: transmission).

28.01.2018 - release
10.03.2018 - html5 port
